Rule.Filter: ([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
[highway] = 'path' and not ([bicycle] = 'designated' or [foot] = 'designated' or [horse] = 'designated') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
[highway] = 'path' and not ([bicycle] = 'designated' or [foot] = 'designated' or [horse] = 'designated') and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')
[highway] = 'path' and not ([bicycle] = 'designated' or [foot] = 'designated' or [horse] = 'designated') and ([bridge] = 'yes' or [bridge] = 'true' or [bridge] = '1')

Datasource.Parameter: (select * from %PREFIX%_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure

(select * from %PREFIX%_polygon where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' or "natural"='land' or "natural"='marsh' order by z_order) as water_areas
(select * from %PREFIX%_line where waterway IS NOT NULL order by z_order) as water_lines
(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length from %PREFIX%_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as piers
(select * from %PREFIX%_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from %PREFIX%_point where highway is NOT NULL) as turning_circle
(select way,tracktype from %PREFIX%_line where highway='track' and (bridge is null or bridge in ('no','false','0')) and (tunnel is null or tunnel in ('no','false','0'))) as tracks
(select way,tracktype from %PREFIX%_line where highway='track' and tunnel in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks
(select way,barrier,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length from %PREFIX%_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads
(select * from %PREFIX%_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure
(select * from %PREFIX%_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from %PREFIX%_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure
(select * from %PREFIX%_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from %PREFIX%_roads order by z_order) as roads
(select * from %PREFIX%_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as buildings
(select * from %PREFIX%_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' order by z_order) as water
(select * from %PREFIX%_line order by z_order) as roads
(select way,tracktype from %PREFIX%_line where highway='track' and bridge in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks
(select * from %PREFIX%_line order by z_order) as access
(select * from %PREFIX%_line where "railway"='tram' order by z_order) as trams

(select * from %PREFIX%_point where amenity IS NOT NULL or tourism is NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL or aerialway is NOT NULL or power_source is NOT NULL) as amenity
(select way from %PREFIX%_point where power='tower') as power_towers

(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,tourism,learning,amenity,place,name,ref,oneway,char_length(ref) as length from %PREFIX%_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads
(select * from %PREFIX%_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure
(select * from %PREFIX%_line order by z_order) as interpolation
(select * from %PREFIX%_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as node_numbers
